data.title: Is this a palindrome?
data.statement: A <<palindrome>> is a word, number, or sequence that is read the same backwards as forwards.  You must decide if a given string is a palindrome.  If it wasn't a palindrome normally, then consider if by ignoring capitalization and non-alphanumerical characters it is a palindrome or not.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: Was it a car or a cat I saw?

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Mr. Owl ate my metal worm!

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: If not for middle this would be eb luow siht elddim rof ton fi

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: $+r0ng de$pi+e nonword character$ $retcarahc drownon e+ip$ed gn0r+$

testCases.title: Test 7
testCases.testIn: Stop! Murder us not, tonsured rumpots!

testCases.title: Validator 7
testCases.testIn: Are we not drawn onward, we few, drawn onward to new era?

testCases.title: Validator 8
testCases.testIn: Enough test cases and validators to make random guessing an invalid strategy

testCases.title: Validator 9
testCases.testIn: A day, a day... yada yada...

testCases.title: Test 10
testCases.testIn: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore

data.outputDescription: A single line containing {{Strong palindrome}} if the string is a palindrome while keeping non-alphanumerical characters and capitalization the same, {{Weak palindrome}} if the string is a palindrome only while ignoring non-alphanumerical characters and capitalization, and {{Not a palindrome}} otherwise.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A palindrome is a word, number, or sequence that is read the same backwards as forwards. You must decide if a given string is a palindrome. If it wasn't a palindrome normally, then consider if by ignoring capitalization and non-alphanumerical characters it is a palindrome or not.
Input
A string S to be checked
Output
A single line containing Strong palindrome if the string is a palindrome while keeping non-alphanumerical characters and capitalization the same, Weak palindrome if the string is a palindrome only while ignoring non-alphanumerical characters and capitalization, and Not a palindrome otherwise.
Constraints
Example
Input
123454321
Output
Strong palindrome
